mapper.insert: insert into TodayWeather(TodayWeatherId, AddressId, Recent, Min, Max, WeatherCode, Time) values (TodayWeatherID_SEQ.nextval, ${addressId}, ${recent}, ${min}, ${max}, ${weatherCode}, ${time})
mapper.update: update TodayWeather set Recent=${recent}, Min=${min}, Max=${max}, WeatherCode=${weatherCode} where AddressId=${addressId} and Time=${time}
update TodayWeather set Recent=${recent}, WeatherCode={weatherCode} where AddressId=${addressId} and Time=${time}
